title: Team Creating CLASH OCE
body: Hello, does anyone know when clash teams can be created? It's been confirmed it starts at 20th May but I've waited a whole day. It's 6.39 pm now and I haven't heard anything about it so far. Some people said the registrations ended yesterday.

replies.body:
Hey mate,

May 20th is when the tournament registrations opened - so are definitely not closed already. 

The tournament will be kicking off on Friday with first matches at 7pm (AEST).  To ensure your team gets entered into a bracket, every member of your team will need to lock in during the 30 minutes before the first match begins. 

So we have time! What troubles are you having exactly?  Are you trying to create a team from within the client (under 'CLASH')?
